title: Relax and Unwind
description: Take a moment to relax and unwind.

title: Learn Something New
description: Dedicate some time to learning a new skill or hobby.

title: Call a Friend or Family Member
description: Reach out to someone you care about.

title: Cook a Homemade Meal
description: Plan a delicious homemade meal and enjoy the process of cooking.

title: Read a Book
description: Set aside some quiet time to read a book of your choice.

title: Exercise
description: Go for a brisk walk or do a short workout session.

title: Buy Groceries
description: Purchase fruits, vegetables, and other essentials from the grocery store
